author: schor
msg: [UIMA-2101] fix test case to account for the fact that on some impl (varies by jdk / os ) the xml writer inserts or doesn't insert a new line before the first <Document> tag.  Before this fix, the test case passed on Windows / IBM Java 7 / 8, but failed on some linux systems (Jenkins).
